name: Enshrouded World
detailed_description:
Enshrouded World is a vehicular combat experience that features non-linear progression and survival elements not seen in the genre until now. These features compliment each other and work to build a strong relationship between player and hovercraft that must be maintained in order to survive. The player is encouraged to explore their environment for supplies to maintain their hovercraft and themselves in the vast number of toxic environments teeming with fierce enemies.

Key Features:


  • A new age: discover a world recovering from centuries of human destruction, an overpopulation crisis and the depletion of resources. With the millions surviving in a supplementary virtual reality ready to emerge into recently established urban centres a series of disembarkation procedures are about to commence. Players assume the role of Jill, a botanist and member of one of the elite teams tasked with overseeing the disembarkation process.

  • Player-orientated progression: intricate webs of environments open the door to an overwhelming number of diverging paths and true player freedom in this fresh approach to progression.

  • An unparalleled combination of combat, exploration, survival and management: the only thing shielding you from the fierce enemies hunting you down is your hovercraft which while formidably armed isn't immune to incoming attacks. Bravely leave the safety of the hovercraft and scavenge resources all whilst monitoring your oxygen supply.
